p: From 1955 to 2011, BEF epidemics were often recorded in mainland China ( 23). China's nationwide sero-surveillance in cattle between 2012 and 2014 demonstrated that the range of BEFV covered most of the area of mainland China ( 24). Epidemics of BEF have also occurred in Korea, and some of them were probably linked to those in Japan ( 19). Meteorological analysis demonstrated that a low-jet stream blew from mainland China, along the Korean Peninsula, to western Japan at the peak of BEF epidemic in China and Korea in 1988 and 1991 ( 19, 25, 26). The stream probably brought the infected vectors and contributed to the BEF expansion to Japan. The seroprevalence of BEFV without clinical cases was demonstrated in Korea between 2009 and 2012 ( 27). Several intervals of BEF epidemic have been documented in Taiwan between 1967 and 2014 ( 28).
